name: Escape Rooms 3 Game
description:
----------------------------------------------------------

'Wow! This Game Is Just Amazing! Excitement All The Way!'
'This Free Game Exceeded My Expectations! Download Now!'
'Downright Fun! My Kid Can't Stop Playing It!'
'I Love It When I Reach The Bottom And Catch The Bag Of Gold!'

----------------------------------------------------------


Welcome to Can You Escape The House 3 - a cool escape game!

Do you think you have the skills with Can You Escape The House 3 - a cool escape game?

Can You Escape The House 3 is an exciting new point and click house escape game for an overall daily dose of fun escape and adventure! A sequel of the previous game Can You Escape The House 2! As a real estate agent, it is your job to check out the house you are going to sell if it’s fit and worth the price for the buyers. Today, you were given another luxurious house to sell and knowing what it really looks and works like is very vital. As you roam around the house, you saw that it is definitely worthy to be called luxurious. But at some point inside, you found that the doors and other exits would not open! What!? Is this some sort of prank!? Well, the only thing to do at this point, is to escape out of here and while you’re at it, try not to destroy things or we can’t sell this no more! Good luck.


Can You Escape The House 3 is another point and click escape game. Assume that you are trapped in your house as the door got locked while you are inside and unfortunately you don’t have the key in your hand. Hence, you must find a way to escape from the house by using things you can get in the house. Relate objects and solve puzzles to escape from the house. Have fun!


Game features:

• Genuine story!
• Innovative puzzles!
• Stunning graphics!
• Realistic atmosphere!
• Tricky and challenging puzzles!
• Gorgeous graphics !
• No signup's required, just download and install!
